title: T-shirt, Colors: A Magazine About the Rest of the World, Multilingual
title_raw: Colors: A Magazine About the Rest of the World, Multilingual
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.
description: The white t-shirt is imprinted in the upper half with a floral spray design in  orange of the slogan, a magazine about the world, in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Korean.  COLORS is imprinted horizontally in red in the center.

T-shirt, Colors: A Magazine About the Rest of the World, Multilingual. 
Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.. 1993-151-437.
